title: Cross-Chain with LayerZero
description: Explore LayerZero on Aptos, an omnichain interoperability protocol that enables secure and efficient cross-chain messaging and asset transfers between Aptos and other major blockchains.

tasks.title: Prepare for Cross-Chain Operations
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to explore LayerZero's cross-chain capabilities

tasks.title: LayerZero Basics
tasks.description: Understand what LayerZero is and how it works
tasks.question: What is LayerZero's primary function in the blockchain ecosystem?
options: A Layer 2 scaling solution for Aptos
A cross-chain messaging and interoperability protocol
tasks.correctAnswer: A cross-chain messaging and interoperability protocol

tasks.title: Security Model
tasks.question: What security approach does LayerZero use for cross-chain communication?
options: Ultra Light Nodes (ULN) with dual-prover model
tasks.correctAnswer: Ultra Light Nodes (ULN) with dual-prover model

tasks.title: Aptos Integration
tasks.description: Understanding how LayerZero works with Aptos
tasks.question: How is LayerZero implemented on Aptos?
options: Through Move modules deployed on the Aptos blockchain
As a separate blockchain connected via API
Through a traditional wrapped token bridge only
tasks.correctAnswer: Through Move modules deployed on the Aptos blockchain

tasks.title: Cross-Chain Asset Transfers
tasks.description: Learn how assets move between chains
tasks.question: How does LayerZero facilitate token transfers between Aptos and other blockchains?
options: By creating wrapped versions of tokens on each chain
By using a shared liquidity pool between chains
tasks.correctAnswer: By creating wrapped versions of tokens on each chain

tasks.title: Supported Chains
tasks.description: Understanding which blockchains can connect with Aptos via LayerZero
tasks.question: Which of these blockchains can connect with Aptos through LayerZero?
options: Multiple chains including Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, Avalanche, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: Multiple chains including Ethereum, Solana, BNB Chain, Avalanche, and more

tasks.title: Applications on LayerZero
tasks.description: Learn about use cases for LayerZero on Aptos
tasks.question: What applications can be built using LayerZero on Aptos?
options: Cross-chain lending, DEXes, NFT marketplaces, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: Cross-chain lending, DEXes, NFT marketplaces, and more

tasks.title: Transaction Fees
tasks.description: Understanding the cost of cross-chain transactions
tasks.question: How are fees handled for cross-chain transactions on LayerZero?
options: Fees in APT only regardless of destination chain
Fees in the source chain's native token to cover gas on both source and destination chains
tasks.correctAnswer: Fees in the source chain's native token to cover gas on both source and destination chains

tasks.title: Messaging Architecture
tasks.description: Learn how LayerZero's cross-chain messaging works
tasks.question: What is a key feature of LayerZero's messaging architecture?
options: It relies on a central server to relay all messages
It can only send simple token transfer messages
It supports arbitrary messaging between smart contracts on different chains
It requires manual approval for each message
tasks.correctAnswer: It supports arbitrary messaging between smart contracts on different chains
